column5: Bebe's Beach Bungalow is a 1 bedroom 1 bath condo at Leeward Isles condominium complex which is just a short walk away from the Gulf of Mexico and the Texas Beaches!!  This unit has been recently remodeled with the local coastal decor and a mix of fine lines. The bedroom has a comfy queen size bed with a beautiful fabric headboard. The living area has a new sofa sleeper with memory foam mattress.  There is a great community pool with gazebo. Prices include the local and occupancy tax.
column8: Bebe's Beach Bungalow North Padre Island Beach
